HI,
            JUNIT is mainly meant for Unit Testing java classes.IT has to be
done by all the testers to make surte that there code works as he
expected.So we can not merely say that JUnit comes under Testing.Its a part
of development process,which every developer should be aware of.

The Site http://juit.org contains extensive documents for getting knowledge
about JUnit.The Book, JUNIT RECIPES
is very good in explaining JUnit concepts.
ALL THE BEST ..


Thanks & Regards,

Saravanan T
